title: Hunter
description: When faced with danger, which do you ask for protection from a violent organization or risk it and run?Chloe Daniels had a choice to make after finding a single piece of paper she wasn’t supposed to see.Her only hope at escaping the monsters now hunting her?The Auckland Kings Crime Family.Or more specifically, Hunter King.Cold. Angry. Callous.The one thing she hadn’t anticipated was just how much the man assigned to watch her could hate her on sight.Can Chloe make it to the end of her vacation without pushing Hunter too far, or will she end up risking the danger without him?Book 2 of The Auckland Kings Crime FamilyThe Auckland Kings Crime Family series is a mafia romance M/F trilogy with each book following a different couple. Each book ends in a HEA and can be read separately, but please note these books contain mature content and may include references to violence, attempted assault, abuse, and other themes that some readers may find triggering.
author: A.J. Macey
